publisher.publisher-name: Association of Teachers of Advanced Composition

title-group.article-title: A Contradictory Assemblage of Self: James Frey, Creative Nonfiction, and the Empire of Oprah

ref.mixed-citation: Mark Hall, in "Oprah's Book Selections: Teleliterature for The Oprah Winfrey Show investigates claims that "television harms the culture of reading" via Oprah's Book Club.
http://www.oprah.com/oprahsbookclub/Synopsis-of-One-Hundred-Years-of- Solitude
